summary: Encapsulates a KNX-controlled cover device, offering asynchronous commands to open, close, stop, and adjust position and tilt, while providing state information such as current position, tilt angle, and closed status. It also manages registration of update callbacks and an automatic updater for keeping the device state in sync.
